description:
Ryo steps in when someone wants to silence a shrine maiden for her inconvenient prophecies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Divine Prophecy on a Summers Evening?! - A Shrine Maiden Gets Her First Lesson in Love
Natsu no Yoru no Otsuge?! Kitoushi no Koi no Tehodoki
夏の夜のお告げ?! 祈祷師に恋の手ほどき
